channel.title: Ted Chiang on PostDoc Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Ted Chiang on PostDoc Problems

item.title: Stories of Your Life and Others
item.description: This is one of those rare sci-fi books that managed to bore me. So much so that I left the last short story halfway through, out of exasperation. I was really looking forward to the book because of Arrival. The story that inspired Arrival, Story of Your Life, is indeed quite good but the rest of the short stories I found to be too dry. (It is certainly possible that I’ve just outgrown short stories).
